item.title: Quarantine Post: Make Homebrew Work in China
item.description: While you are reading this post, I have probably been in quarantine for several days. Yes! I’m home, but in a hotel for now. I have a lot of ideas that I want to work on. I’m not disclosing any of them, but the gist is that by realizing those ideas, I get to experience the same workflow as before but in a different country with some internet censorships. I will have to naturally get through them if I want to work in the same way as before.
